permissionsButton.message: Click here to access ChatGPT.com with all AIPRM features

permissionsDenied.message:
To make sure you can keep using AIPRM without interruption, we need you to enable AIPRM on the new ChatGPT domain. Simply click the button below and allow the permissions when prompted.

You have to click on the "Allow" button.

permissionsGranted.message: Thanks for being a valued member of the AIPRM community!

permissionsMainText.message: Enable AIPRM on the new ChatGPT.com domain to continue enjoying all features.
